subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After a shaky start, the Nets got back on track by dismantling the Jazz at Barclays Center with six Nets players finishing with double figures in points, led by Brook Lopez’s 27 points.
snippet: After a shaky start, the Nets got back on track by dismantling the Jazz at Barclays Center with six Nets players finishing with double figures in points, led by Brook Lopez’s 27 points.
